data.name: Biwar Legend of Dragon Slayer
data.detailed_description:
Join Our Discord!


About the Game





One day in the dark forest with abandoned shipwrecks and piles of human wrecks in a war with a dragon, a teenager on an adventure to find out the truth about a dragon and why his parents died. Now you need to survive the adventure and solve all of the puzzles using magic powers such as telekinesis power, Agni Toya elements, and Non Euclidean puzzles that are blocking your way. Fight the Mythology Creatures from the forbidden forest and "FIND YOUR DESTINY"

Biwar Legend of Dragon Slayer is an Action-Adventure Puzzle game that invites you to explore the puzzles using magic mechanic such a: Telekinesis Power, Agni and Toya elements and Non Euclidean puzzles. The third-person game will give you experience of fight the Mythology Creatures in a fantasy realm, The game is set in South East Asia culture of Balinese ancient environment and Papuans folklore are the unique of Nusantara Culture.

ACTION-ADVENTURE PUZZLE

  • Play as Biwar, a teenager from Papua island who adventures in the forbidden forest to find out the truth about a dragon and why his parents died. The game is set in a beautiful ancient Balinese environment and Papuan folklore are the unique of Nusantara


  • Adventure to explore beautiful ancient Balinese environment and there are to solve puzzles using magic mechanic, such as: Telekinesis power, Agni and Toya elements, and Non Euclidean puzzles


  • Fight Mythology Creatures with a machete (Indonesian sword), shield, and bow of magic elements. Attack them with multi-style action and finally defeat the dragon

data.short_description: Biwar Legend Of Dragon Slayer is Action-Adventure Puzzle use the Magic Mechanic such a : Telekinesis Power, Agni and Toya Elements, and Non Euclidean puzzles
data.reviews:
“On top of that, arguably one of the most impressive things in this game is how the entire game uses a Balinese dialect instead of the conventional Indonesian that is used today.”
IGN Southeast Asia

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz / Intel Core i5-11400 T 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 6 GB for Demo
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 3400 G 3,7GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1660 super (6 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 6 GB for Demo
